articles.title: Breeze Airways adding 10 routes, including first flights out of New York - USA TODAY
articles.description: Most of the new flights will be to and from Westchester County Airport in metropolitan New York
articles.content:
Breeze Airways is expanding to metropolitan New York, but travelers won't find any flights out of the city's major airports.
